newsitem.title: UK: Natwest hikes UK base rate to 6.75 pct.
newsitem.headline: Natwest hikes UK base rate to 6.75 pct.

text.p: National Westminster Bank plc said on Thursday it was raising its UK base lending rate to 6.75 percent from 6.50 percent in line with a similar hike from the Bank of England of its money market dealing rates.
